example.name: the one example
example.text: Yesterday's election was a sequel to Enfield's annual meeting in June when Mr. Blair disallowed proxies in favor of two Hees nominees *trace*.
example.arg: in favor of two Hees nominees

roleset.note: The 'in favor of...' clause is problematic. It's marked as -CLR in treebank, but I think that misses the generalization that 'in favor of' can be attached to any verb of dispreferring. I feel 'in favor of' to be a predicate in its own right, similar to comparatives, and therefore safely postponed until we deal with that question.
